data.title: Salvatore Quasimodo – Prize presentation
data.meta_description: The Nobel Prize in Literature 1959 was awarded to Salvatore Quasimodo "for his lyrical poetry, which with classical fire expresses the tragic experience of life in our own times"
data.text:
Salvatore Quasimodo

Prize presentation

Your browser does not support the video tag.

Watch a video clip of the 1959 Nobel Laureate in Literature, Salvatore Quasimodo, receiving his Nobel Prize medal and diploma during the Nobel Prize Award Ceremony at the Concert Hall in Stockholm, Sweden, on 10 December 1959.

From Aktuellt 1959-12-10.

To cite this section
